beer.beer_description:
Soft bitterness, full aroma, and distinct hoppy flavour from four local hop varieties.

Golden in colour and light in character, this will win you over from the start with its tropical fruit aromas.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 70 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 15!

items.badge_description:
Hoppy International Beer Day!

Beer serves as the common thread that links us worldwide, possessing the ability to bring people together in a unique way.

Beer has played a significant role in shaping countless of our most cherished memories. And if there‚Äôs one thing we‚Äôve learned along the way, beer is best when shared with others.

Celebrate one of the fastest growing sports in the world with this exclusive National Disc Golf Day badge sponsored by the Disc Golf Pro Tour. Disc golf is easy to learn, affordable to play, and accessible to all ages and skill levels. Played much like traditional golf but with flying discs and chain baskets, the game blends precision, strategy, and athleticism with serene natural environments. The best disc golfers in the world play on the Disc Golf Pro Tour. You can watch the Disc Golf Pro Tour for FREE on the JomezPro YouTube channel! WATCH DISC GOLF HIGHLIGHTS
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it‚Äôs time to drink it! That‚Äôs 160 check-ins with a photo.
